assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vaibhav Global Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, retails, trades in, and exports fashion jewelry, accessories, lifestyle, and essential products. The company offers colored gems stones, precious and semi-precious stones, bracelets, bangles, earrings, studded jewelry, etc.; fashion accessories, such as scarves, handbags, etc.; and lifestyle products comprising home decor and kitchen products. It also provides hand sanitizers, towels, face masks, tissue rolls, shampoos, beauty products, home products, food, kitchenware, etc. The company sells its products through departmental stores; TV shopping channels; and through internet shopping websites and mobile apps, as well as is involved in the B2B wholesale distribution in the United States and the United Kingdom. Vaibhav Global Limited operates in United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, India, Hong Kong, rest of Europe, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Vaibhav Gems Limited and changed its name to Vaibhav Global Limited in 2013. Vaibhav Global Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Jaipur, India. Vaibhav Global Limited is a subsidiary of Brett Enterprises Private Limited.
